content:
You can attach a few files for test decryption by packing them into an archive with zip, rar, tar, 7zip, 7z, tar.gz extensions of no more than 10 megabytes using the attach button directly in the chat.

If your archive weighs more than 10 megabytes, please use our file sharing service.
http://lockbitfss2w7co3ij6am6wox4xcurtgwukunx3yubcoe5cbxiqakxqd.onion
http://lockbitfsvf75glg226he5inkfgtuoakt4vgfhd7nfgghx5kwz5zo3ad.onion
http://lockbitfskq2fxclyfrop5yizyxpzu65w7pphsgthawcyb4gd27x62id.onion
For security reasons we do not click on other links you send in chat.
Please wait for a reply, sometimes it takes several hours due to possible time zone differences.
drecrypt test dont work
hi

6Á^
hiii
hi friend, talk me
sent my archive but not decrypt .. how i can trust in you where my files dont recovery for test in website
hi, wait
ok
Hi ?
I have a 20-gigabyte file to recover. How can I know if you are truly able to perform the recovery process and if it is guaranteed? Do you have the recovery key? I need help.
The test we just performed did not work.
this is a original file ... for test i need recovery this file ...
hi
Hi. Wait for my boss to come online. In the meantime, check out the tree of information stolen from you.
ok, how many time for response for my case?
several hours
Can't you prove you can recover? If they do not prove successful I will format my machines. I need a confirmation to release the payment to you
https://temp.sh/WMHEH/tree_MCERVANTES.txt - tree of stolen data
Only my boss can do this, he is not at work yet.
Wait
ok my friend
We are a non-profit school... If they prove that they recover the sent file we can see the payment
I need to retrieve the files demonstrated in the tree you uploaded... i wait for you
In this file there is content that I know what it is to validate if you can effectively repair it.
Request 10 files from the tree. The files should not be important and should provide opportunities for restoring backups.
Let's make a first agreement.... How much do you charge for this file... Then I will need the SQL files.
We make a one-time deal. You pay the ransom, get the stolen information removed from our servers and a full restoration of your systems
What is the value?
Dude, we are a non-profit school, we can research, we are not banks or big companies, which make a lot of money, we are a school to educate children.

I know this doesn't matter to you, but honestly, we are a school.
Don't you have a code of conduct to protect at least some institutions? Just to understand

Explicação Detalhada:
Privado, mas sem fins lucrativos:
O colégio é uma instituição privada, o que significa que é gerido por particulares e não pelo Estado. No entanto, ao contrário de uma empresa que visa lucrar, Cervantes não tem a intenção de gerar lucro para os seus proprietários.

https://www.google.com.br/search?q=col%C3%A9gio+miguel+de+cervantes+%C3%A9+sem+fins+lucrativos&sca_esv=4ef6d43eae67c29a&ei=O6YMaI_CL67b1sQPyaD28QE&ved=0ahUKEwjPy5acsPWMAxWurZUCHUmQPR4Q4dUDCBA&uact=5&oq=col%C3%A9gio+miguel+de+cervantes+%C3%A9+sem+fins+lucrativos&gs_lp=Egxnd3Mtd2l6LXNlcnAaAhgCIjNjb2zDqWdpbyBtaWd1ZWwgZGUgY2VydmFudGVzIMOpIHNlbSBmaW5zIGx1Y3JhdGl2b3MyCBAAGKIEGIkFMgUQABjvBTIFEAAY7wUyCBAAGIAEGKIEMggQABiABBiiBEi5RlDKBVihRXAGeAGQAQCYAfICoAH_PaoBCDAuNDcuMy4xuAEDyAEA--AUYqAMYiwMYrwEYlwUY3AQY3gQY4ATYAQHCAgYQABgWGB7CAgIQJsICBRAhGKABwgIIEAAYFhgKGB7CAgcQIRigARgKwgIEECEYCpgDAIgGAZAGCroGBggBEAEYFJIHCDYuNDcuMy4xoAfh0QSyBwgwLjQ3LjMuMbgH3EA&sclient=gws-wiz-serp

Veja a descrição sobre o colégio no google
100k usd
Dude, I'm from Brazil, I haven't even made that much in many years
Did you understand that we are a non-profit school? That several children have scholarships
I know you don't respect that, but honestly, we're a school, I don't have anywhere near that kind of money, and I'm going to lose my job, my God.
please i need your help
I take out a loan from the bank and get 4k usd
I got this loan credit from the bank, but I can't get it anymore

Dude, thank you so much for your kindness!
Unfortunately, I tried to recover one of the lost files from Azure, I recovered the others, but one of them didn't work. If I can get 4k USD, can you help me, for the love of God? I have a daughter in college, I'm not lying.
I need to recover a database that has everything from school.

This txt password was the password for a bank backup, but it didn't work :-( I can pay 4k, I just needed to recover a database... sorry to be annoying, but I'm a mother of 3 children, I'll prove it to you, one daughter is in college and I pay, I can't quit my job
help me please
My time is running out... My bosses want to fire me... We can recover my environment for $4000... please help me I will be fired
oi

Hi friend, how are you? I'm sorry to be annoying, could you help me and restore this file? It won't solve my life, but at least I won't be kicked out of the company. Can you help me again? I know it's not common.
and I have a bank file to restore as well that I would like to trade with you
Hello, will you help me, I will have to format everything and I will lose 1 month of data, I haven't slept since yesterday
I have already checked how to buy bitcoins, you help me describe if I pay the 4K, that's all I can if you tell me ok I'll buy it now and transfer it to you
Hi, tell me the minimum amount you can afford, I'll see what I can do, please help me recover the encrypted files, I'll take out another loan, just tell me the amount you can afford
100k usd

I'll talk to the school and explain.
Unfortunately, I need to format everything. I was hoping you'd understand that we're a non-profit school. We have several students on scholarships, several social projects, if you want, you can research. We're not a company that exploits employees for big profits, because I imagine that's why you do it. But I'll let you know, if they can't pay, I'll do my best here.
And in the end, I'll lose my job. I'll let you know that I couldn't do it and let you know again. My only problem is a 20 gig file, that's all.

The Azure crap didn't restore a database backup, that's my only problem and that's why I'm going to lose my job. Wouldn't you charge less for just this file?
I won't bother you anymore, as soon as I have a response from management, I'll let you know. But if God touches your heart in any way, I'll have the chat open all day long.
Offer a higher amount
As I informed you, we are a non-profit school, it is very difficult to make a profit, we have no funds.
As I informed you, we are a non-profit school, it is very difficult to make a profit, we have no funds.
25 gigas

There is a person who was fired from school, she was not an honest person, with her password she deleted several things afterwards, because there was a backdoor user, so out of malice I think she passed information to you.
the intention was certainly to harm me
hi
Think about the price again

Dude, the school's maintainers don't receive any profit. If you want, I can prove it to you.

I'm sure that whoever contacted you did so with the intention of directly harming me.

I would just like you to help me and tell me what your minimum is. I understand that you don't negotiate, that you have your own price, but look, we are a school, all our income goes to paying the employees and keeping the school running.

I don't know what to offer, 20k? That's a lot of money in Reais.
You say the least you can do? That way I won't take up any more of your time. Given everything I've explained to you
I can't give big discounts, otherwise my boss will fire me. Try to offer more, I'll try to persuade him.
